title: Instructional Design Competency Development Program for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science fields and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate science education managers/leaders, this program emphasizes strengthening competencies in designing modular microlearning using digital devices in offline environments

learning_goals: Write a science education content design document by applying the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation)
Independently develop at least one microlearning module using CAI (Computer-Assisted Instruction) tools
Develop 10 summative assessment items according to design criteria for measuring learning effectiveness

resources: Digital device set for practical use

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
